Charmer Quartet in Bloom._current: 2+ monsters Gains 300 ATK for each different Attribute on the field. Once, while this card is face-up on the field, during the Main Phase (QUICK EFFECT): You can target 2 monsters in your GY with the same Attribute but different Types, or with the same Type but different Attributes; Special Summon both, also until the end of the next turn, this card and the Special Summoned monsters cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon. You can only use this effect of "Charmer Quartet in Bloom" once per turn.

Charmers of the Grand Circle._current: 2+ "Charmer" or "Familiar-Possessed" monsters If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can activate this effect; for each different original Attribute used for its Fusion Summon (max. 4), you can apply 1 effect from this list. You can choose the same effect more than once. Resolve each effect before choosing again. ● This card gains 800 ATK. ● SEARCH 1 "Possessed" Spell/Trap. ● BOUNCE 1 card on the field. ● Special Summon 1 Spellcaster monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Charmers of the Grand Circle" once per turn.

Clown Crew Biancaviso._current: You can Tribute Summon this card face-up by Tributing 1 Ritual, Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, Pendulum or Link Monster. If this card is Tribute Summoned: You can activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each effect of "Clown Crew Biancaviso" once per turn); ● DRAW cards equal to the number of monsters Tributed for its Tribute Summon. ● NEGATE the effects of face-up cards your opponent controls, equal to the number of monsters Tributed for its Tribute Summon. Once per turn, during your opponent's Main Phase, you can (QUICK EFFECT): Immediately after this effect resolves, Tribute Summon 1 monster.

Gorgon of Zilofthonia._current:
2+ Effect Monsters
You cannot Summon/Set monsters to a zone(s) this card points to.
① Monsters this card points to cannot attack, also their activated effects are negated.
② Gains ATK equal to the total original ATK of monsters this card points to.
③ Cannot be destroyed by battle or monster effects, while this card points to no monsters.

Marshmao☆Yummy._current:
① HOPT | If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are LIGHT Beast monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
② HOPT | If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Yummy" Spell/Trap from your GY to your hand, or, if this card was Special Summoned by the effect of a Synchro Monster, you can place 1 "Yummy" Field Spell or 1 "Yummy" Continuous Spell/Trap from your Deck or BANISHment, face-up on your field instead.

Megalith Notrah Plura._current: You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Megalith" card. Must be Ritual Summoned using only Ritual Monsters. ① HOPT | You can reveal this card in your hand; this turn, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of your "Megalith" Ritual Monster effects. ② HOPT | QUICK | When your opponent activates a card or effect: You can NEGATE the activation, and if you do, DESTROY that card, then if that negated card or effect targeted a card(s) on the field, you can Tribute 1 monster your opponent controls.

Solfachord Happiness._current: Activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each effect of "Solfachord Happiness" once per turn); ● DISCARD 1 card, and if you do, SEARCH 2 "Solfachord" Pendulum Monsters with different Scales then you can Special Summon "Solfachord" Pendulum Monsters from your hand, up to the number of monsters your opponent controls +1. ● During your Main Phase this turn, you can conduct 1 Pendulum Summon of a "Solfachord" monster(s) in addition to your Pendulum Summon (you can only gain this effect once per turn). ● Special Summon 2 "Solfachord" cards from your Pendulum Zones.

Supreme King Starving Venom Wing Dragon._current: 1 Fusion Monster + 1 "Clear Wing" monster Once per turn, if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) face-up (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 of them; this card gains ATK equal to that monster's ATK, and if it does, that monster's effects are negated. These changes last until the end of this turn. Once per turn, when another card or their effect is activated on the field (QUICK EFFECT): You can DESTROY 1 card on the field. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone. [Pendulum Effect] Each time a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field, place 1 Predator Counter on each one, and if it is Level 2 or higher, it becomes Level 1 as long as it has a Predator Counter.

The Crimson King._current: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner DARK monsters If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can SEARCH 1 card that mentions "Red Dragon Archfiend". When your opponent activates a monster effect (QUICK EFFECT): You can BANISH this card you control; Special Summon 1 "Red Dragon Archfiend" from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Synchro Summon), and if you do, its ATK becomes doubled, also it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. You can only use each effect of "The Crimson King" once per turn.

Vidolium the Unstable Power Patron of Un._current: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck or GY) by returning 3 monsters (1 Fusion, 1 Synchro and 1 Xyz) from your face-up field and/or GY to the Extra Deck. Unaffected by monster effects, except "Power Patron" monsters. If this card is added to your Extra Deck face-up: You can SEARCH 1 "Power Patron" card. You can only use this effect of "Vidolium the Unstable Power Patron of Unity" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: BANISH (face-down) all cards in the GYs. [Pendulum Effect] You can activate 1 of these effects; ● DESTROY this card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Power Patron" monster from your hand or GY. ● DESTROY this card, also for the rest of this turn "Power Patron" monsters you control whose original Level is 12 gain 5000 ATK. You can only use this effect of "Vidolium the Unstable Power Patron of Unity" once per turn.

Yummy★Snatchy._current: 1 Level 4 or lower LIGHT Beast monster ① HOPT | If this card is Special Summoned: You can place 1 "Yummy" Field Spell from your hand or Deck, face-up on your field, also you cannot Link Summon Link-3 or higher Link Monsters for the rest of this turn. ② QUICK | Once per Chain, during the Main Phase or your opponent's Battle Phase: You can pay 100 LP; immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon using monsters you control as material, including a "Yummy" monster.
